meanings.definition: A person who operates a projector.
meanings.sent1: The projectionists set up the movie for everyone to watch.
meanings.sent2: The projectionists at the cinema make sure the films are shown correctly.
meanings.sent3: The projectionists accidentally projected the movie on the wrong screen, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The projectionists are like wizards, bringing images to life on the big screen.
meanings.sent5: The projectionists carefully adjust the focus to make the movie crystal clear for the audience.

meanings.sent1: We need more projectionists to help with the film screenings.
meanings.sent2: The group of projectionists gathered to discuss the upcoming movie schedule.
meanings.sent3: The projectionists formed a band called 'The Screen Stars' for fun.
meanings.sent4: The projectionists worked together like a well-oiled machine, smoothly running the projector.
meanings.sent5: The projectionists' dedication to their craft shines through in every movie they show.
